Text: ENJOY ENJOY Private Infiltrator New PC Game by DEFA!
Hello there. I am the developer of Private Infiltrator. I hope you get to enjoy the game. Please don't hesitate to use the in-game feedback button for any suggestions. Have fun!
I'll also be looking at the comments from time to time, so don't hesitate to ask about anything.
@ProfessorSnake Is this on GreenLight? I bought it on Desura already. Just wondering so I can upvote.
Indeed it is, many thanks for the support.
By the way, your torrent image is outdated. You should get the one with the fixed subtitle from the greenlight page.
